english.segment1: at the big blue summer noon. from this tiny space. window parts the open heart. with quickened pace. how can this be?. nothing can assure. a section this small of the I endures
english.segment2: half ell belle with plastic legs that are too long. dress her up to sing a different song. yesterday this, that the day before. this wont last a second more
english.segment3: diving in the wishing well. look for what I lack. but every tarnished coin. I threw right back
english.segment4: for my own I'd do anything. for my own I'd go anywhere
